Premium Mentorship

1-on-1 Mentorship

The most intensive form of guidance with full personal attention. 10 structured lessons specifically designed for your trading goals and challenges.

Personal Attention

100% focus on your situation, goals and challenges. No distractions, no waiting lists, just pure personal guidance.

Structured Curriculum

10 proven lessons covering everything from market structure to long-term consistency. Each lesson builds on the previous one.

Direct Support

WhatsApp access during office hours for direct questions and real-time feedback on your trades and homework.

What's included

10 structured weekly sessions (60-90 min each)
Personal custom roadmap and curriculum
Live trade reviews and feedback
DM support during office hours
Access to all templates and tools
Personal WhatsApp support
Homework assignments with reviews

What you DON'T get

Guaranteed profits or income claims
Trading signals or copy-trading
24/7 availability (office hours only)
Financial advice or investment recommendations
Support for trading strategies other than SMC

How does it work?

1

Intake Call

Free 15-min introduction to discuss goals and expectations

2

Personal Roadmap

Start with lesson 1 and progress through all 10 structured lessons

3

Weekly Sessions

60-90 min personal sessions with theory, practice, homework review and Q&A

4

Ongoing Support

WhatsApp support and trade reviews between sessions

Disclaimer: The information on this website and in all sessions is educational only. This is not financial advice. Trading crypto carries risks; you can lose your entire investment.

Complete Smart Money Concepts Curriculum

A structured 20-week program from basic to advanced trading strategies

Lesson 1
Module 1

Introduction & What to Expect

  • Mentor introduction & student introductions
  • What students can expect from the mentorship
  • Overview of the 10 lessons (high-level roadmap)
  • How homework & accountability will work
  • Quick walkthrough of tools/platforms needed (TradingView, journaling, etc.)
Lesson 2
Module 2

Market Structure & Liquidity

  • Identifying swing highs/lows
  • Break of Structure (BOS) & Change of Character (CHoCH)
  • External vs internal liquidity
  • Equal highs/lows, session highs/lows
  • LRLR (liquidity runs liquidity runs)
Lesson 3
Module 3

Key SMC Tools

  • Order Blocks (OB)
  • Breaker Blocks
  • Fair Value Gaps (FVGs)
  • Inversed Fair Value Gaps (iFVGs)
  • Fibonacci Retracement (premium/discount zones, fair value)
Lesson 4
Module 4

Risk Management

  • Your risk per trade (1–2%) & why
  • Journaling mistakes & lessons
  • Handling drawdowns
  • Creating your personal risk plan
Lesson 5
Module 5

Trade Management

  • Placing stop losses & TPs (your rules)
  • Partial profits vs full TP
  • Managing trades once in profit
  • Avoiding micromanagement
Lesson 6
Module 6

Summary: Putting the Pieces Together

  • Recap of all previous lessons (structure → liquidity → tools → risk → trade management)
  • How confluences stack together into a trade idea
  • Walking through a full example from bias to execution
Lesson 7
Module 7

Strategies (Day & Swing)

  • Strategy 1: Your day trade model (ex. NY session setup with OB + FVG + liquidity grab)
  • Strategy 2: Your swing trade model (higher timeframe bias + premium/discount zones + key liquidity)
  • When to apply each strategy
Lesson 8
Module 8

Case Studies & Live Breakdown

  • Analyze past winning trades step by step
  • Review losing trades honestly
  • Students attempt their own narrative building
Lesson 9
Module 9

Advanced Case Study (Student-Led)

  • Students present their own trade narrative (bias → liquidity → tools → risk → management → strategy)
  • Live feedback & corrections
  • Refining their narrative & preparing final trading plan
Lesson 10
Module 10

Developing Long-Term Consistency

  • Creating a personal trading plan (strategy selection, risk rules, daily routine)
  • Journaling & review process for growth
  • How to keep improving without guidance (backtesting, self-review)
  • Building consistency & avoiding burnout
  • Final Q&A and mentorship wrap-up

What you learn in this program

Complete understanding of Smart Money Concepts and institutional trading
Master market structure analysis and liquidity identification
Apply effective risk management with 1-2% risk per trade
Develop your own day trading and swing trading strategies
Build complete trade narratives from bias to execution
Maintain discipline and consistency in trading approach
